name: <color_light_blue>Really Dark Skies</color>
description: A supplement mod that increments the Cataclysm Bright Nights experience by adding an inscrutable evil, extra-terrestrial humanoid paramilitary expeditionary force to your typical survival scenario. /n/n Complements to the vanilla adding the evil aliens 'The Xenoids', the murderous altertive zombies 'Strays', and terrifingly armored [REDACTED], and more!  <color_light_red>Prepare for a challenge.</color>
